description: Security pack: detect GitHub personal access token

explanation_trace.why_triggered: Content matches gh[pousr]_[A-Za-z0-9_]{36,} regex for GitHub tokens
explanation_trace.edge_case_notes: GitHub PATs use the ghp_ prefix (personal), gho_ (OAuth), ghu_ (user-to-server), ghs_ (server-to-server), ghr_ (refresh)
